simplestorage.crate.info:
Upgradable storage.
Randomly selects a variant upon placement (can be changed).
Configurable to keep inventory on disassembly
simplestorage.crate.wrench:
Let-click with a wrench to disassemble.
Sneak-Right-click with a wrench with a Storage Compartment in your off-hand to install
Sneak-Right-click with wrench to cycle variants.
